/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the tranquil ambiance of the city. The trees, stripped of their leaves, stand bare against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, hinting at a late autumn or winter season. The sun casts its warm glow through the branches, illuminating the scene with a soft, natural light. In the distance, buildings and a bridge can be seen, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise peaceful setting. The image is bathed in the vibrant colors of the day, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
